alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 12:07AM CDT until May 02 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Eastland County in north central Texas... Southern Stephens County in north central Texas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1207 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gunsight, or 12 miles northwest of Eastland, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Ranger, Necessity and Gunsight. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 353 and 356. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
